tool_description:
A powerful REST API that encrypts PDFs (set password and security permissions).

The PDF is not archived.
name: PDF Encrypt
title: PDF Encrypt

api_list.name: encrypt
api_list.description: Encrypt pdf file with specific permission
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pdf-encrypt.p.rapidapi.com/encrypt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdf-encrypt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pdf-encrypt.p.rapidapi.com/encrypt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdf-encrypt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
